verses.text: \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w those|strong="G3778"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, when the \w number|strong="G4129"\w* of the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* was \w multiplied|strong="G4129"\w*, there \w arose|strong="G1096"\w* a \w murmuring|strong="G1112"\w* of the \w Grecians|strong="G1675"\w* \w against|strong="G4314"\w* the \w Hebrews|strong="G1445"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w widows|strong="G5503"\w* were \w neglected|strong="G3865"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w daily|strong="G2522"\w* \w ministration|strong="G1248"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* the \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w called|strong="G4341"\w* the \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w* of the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \add unto them\add*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, It \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w reason|strong="G0701"\w* \w that|strong="G2641"\w* \w we|strong="G2248"\w* should \w leave|strong="G2641"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, and \w serve|strong="G1247"\w* \w tables|strong="G5132"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, look ye \w out|strong="G1980"\w* among \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* honest \w report|strong="G3140"\w*, \w full|strong="G4134"\w* of \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* we may \w appoint|strong="G2525"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w business|strong="G5532"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* will give ourselves \w continually|strong="G4342"\w* to \w prayer|strong="G4335"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to the \w ministry|strong="G1248"\w* of the \w word|strong="G3056"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w saying|strong="G3056"\w* \w pleased|strong="G0700"\w* the \w whole|strong="G3956"\w* \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w chose|strong="G1586"\w* \w Stephen|strong="G4736"\w*, a \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \w full|strong="G4134"\w* of \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Prochorus|strong="G4402"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Nicanor|strong="G3527"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Timon|strong="G5096"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Parmenas|strong="G3937"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Nicolas|strong="G3532"\w* a \w proselyte|strong="G4339"\w* of \w Antioch|strong="G0491"\w*:

\w Whom|strong="G3739"\w* they \w set|strong="G2476"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* when they had \w prayed|strong="G4336"\w*, they \w laid|strong="G2007"\w* \add their\add* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* on \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w increased|strong="G0837"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w number|strong="G0706"\w* of the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w multiplied|strong="G4129"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w* \w greatly|strong="G4970"\w*; \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w a|strong="G3793"\w* \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w company|strong="G3793"\w* of the \w priests|strong="G2409"\w* were \w obedient|strong="G5219"\w* to the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Stephen|strong="G4736"\w*, \w full|strong="G4134"\w* of \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w*, \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w wonders|strong="G5059"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w miracles|strong="G4592"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* there \w arose|strong="G0450"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* is \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \add the synagogue\add* of the \w Libertines|strong="G3032"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Cyrenians|strong="G2956"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Alexandrians|strong="G0221"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* of \w Cilicia|strong="G2791"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w Asia|strong="G0773"\w*, \w disputing|strong="G4802"\w* with \w Stephen|strong="G4736"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w were|strong="G2480"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w able|strong="G2480"\w* to \w resist|strong="G0436"\w* the \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* by \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he \w spake|strong="G2980"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* they \w suborned|strong="G5260"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w*, which \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, We have \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w blasphemous|strong="G0989"\w* \w words|strong="G4487"\w* \w against|strong="G1519"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add against\add* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* they stirred \w up|strong="G4787"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w elders|strong="G4245"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* came \w upon|strong="G2186"\w* \add him\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w caught|strong="G4884"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w brought|strong="G0071"\w* \add him\add* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w council|strong="G4892"\w*,

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* set \w up|strong="G2476"\w* \w false|strong="G5571"\w* \w witnesses|strong="G3144"\w*, which \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w ceaseth|strong="G3973"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* to \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w blasphemous|strong="G0989"\w* \w words|strong="G4487"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*:

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* we have \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* of \w Nazareth|strong="G3480"\w* shall \w destroy|strong="G2647"\w* \w this|strong="G5126"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shall \w change|strong="G0236"\w* the \w customs|strong="G1485"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G0537"\w* that \w sat|strong="G2516"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w council|strong="G4892"\w*, looking \w stedfastly|strong="G0816"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w* as it had \w been|strong="G5616"\w* the \w face|strong="G4383"\w* of an \w angel|strong="G0032"\w*.
